name: VR Wormhole
description:
Welcome VR Fans! Beware, this game is highly addictive!
Fast travel through the wormhole, to achieve what no man or woman has done before.
Reach Alpha Centauri in less than blink still requires some pilot skill, Can you handle this great challenge?

-- No controller needed.
-- Suitable for all VR headsets.
-- Fast Velocity Challenge in Warp Space.
-- pass along planets of the solar system.
-- Awesome space travel.


Please leave an honest review, if your devices not suitable or got any crashes, please leave a message on my website.
